argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r s

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( r = R -> ( r e. RingOps <-> R e. RingOps ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_anbi1d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( r e. RingOps /\ s e. RingOps ) <-> ( R e. RingOps /\ s e. RingOps ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( r = R -> ( r RngIso s ) = ( R RngIso s ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( r = R -> ( f e. ( r RngIso s ) <-> f e. ( R RngIso s ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_exbidv | |- ( r = R -> ( E. f f e. ( r RngIso s ) <-> E. f f e. ( R RngIso s ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( r = R -> ( ( ( r e. RingOps /\ s e. RingOps ) /\ E. f f e. ( r RngIso s ) ) <-> ( ( R e. RingOps /\ s e. RingOps ) /\ E. f f e. ( R RngIso s ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( s = S -> ( s e. RingOps <-> S e. RingOps ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_anbi2d | |- ( s = S -> ( ( R e. RingOps /\ s e. RingOps ) <-> ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( s = S -> ( R RngIso s ) = ( R RngIso S ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( s = S -> ( f e. ( R RngIso s ) <-> f e. ( R RngIso S ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_exbidv | |- ( s = S -> ( E. f f e. ( R RngIso s ) <-> E. f f e. ( R RngIso S ) ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( s = S -> ( ( ( R e. RingOps /\ s e. RingOps ) /\ E. f f e. ( R RngIso s ) ) <-> ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps ) /\ E. f f e. ( R RngIso S ) ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_df-risc | |- ~=R = { <. r , s >. | ( ( r e. RingOps /\ s e. RingOps ) /\ E. f f e. ( r RngIso s ) ) } |
| 14 | 6, 12, 13 | #P_brabg | |- ( ( R e. A /\ S e. B ) -> ( R ~=R S <-> ( ( R e. RingOps /\ S e. RingOps ) /\ E. f f e. ( R RngIso S ) ) ) ) |
